name: Foundry
description: The Foundry is the Tier 4  variant of the Anvil Bench that will allow the Prospector to craft the highest quality tools/weapons available on planet, such as the Titanium Pickaxe , Compound Bow , etc. The Foundry is also capable of crafting Tier 2  / Tier 3  tools and weapons, removing the need for a Anvil Bench and Forge .
